section_a.beneficiaries: People who wish to participate in sport and associated activities but have a barrier to participation eg. Disability or Lack of financial provision. Defiant Sports will provide activities and events tailored to the specific needs of those who wish to overcome barriers to participation. Defiant Sports will also support and encourage volunteers to undertake coaching qualifications, particularly those keen to work in the disability sector or being disabled themselves (including those in other groups facing barriers to participation). ¢

section_b.surplus_use: Purchasing further equipment for current activities, increasing provision of activities or otherwise supporting those facing a barrier to sport participation (playing or coaching).
